title: Anyone have a nice Carolina Brights Collins and want to downgrade?
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Anyone have a nice Carolina Brights Collins and want to downgrade?
posts.post_content:
Super longshot I realize.  If anyone out there has one of these in nicer shape and would consider trading for mine plus cash or mine plus cards, please send me a message.  I have tons of other t206s that I could trade.

These two are not for sale or trade in any other scenario.
